name: Node.js CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4
    - name: Setup Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v4
      with:
        node-version: '22.x'
    - run: npm install
    - run: npm test
    - run: npm run test:coverage
